snippet: Franco Bernabe, the Telecom Italia chairman, said its board of directors had received an offer from Hutchison Whampoa, and that a committee of its biggest shareholders would review it.
abstract: Telecom Italia will formally consider offer to merge with 3 Italia, smaller rival owned by Hong Kong industrial group Hutchison Whampoa.
lead_paragraph: Franco Bernabe, the Telecom Italia chairman, said its board of directors had received an offer from Hutchison Whampoa, and that a committee of its biggest shareholders would review it.

headline.main: Hong Kong Operator Makes Bid for Telecom Italia
headline.print_headline: Seeking Investors, Italy's Biggest Telecom Firm Considers a Merge
